phases.name: Phase 1: Environment Setup
tasks: Clone GitHub repository
Create Python 3.11 venv
Install scipy, numpy, pandas, astropy, emcee
Register on OSF.io
Preregister hypotheses (RAR Lock, Flow, Universality)
Lock seed values in CONFIG.json

risks.mitigation: Use Google Cloud Shell as fallback (no installation needed)
Use Codespaces or Cloud Shell to clone
risks.detection_trigger: git clone fails with auth error

phases.name: Phase 2: Deep River SPARC Fitting
tasks: Download SPARC dataset (153 galaxies)
Implement SavageKernel fitting loop
Fit σ_c, η, α for each galaxy (multiprocessing recommended)
Export results to deepriver_results.csv
Compute aeff for each galaxy

risks.mitigation: Relax bounds on σ_c, η; use emcee instead of curvefit for problematic galaxies
Write flexible loader with alias detection; test on first 5 galaxies
risks.detection_trigger: ValueError on column read for first galaxy

risks.impact: Azure credits exhaust; computation times out
risks.mitigation: Use Google Cloud Shell (free tier); reduce to 50 galaxies first, scale later
risks.detection_trigger: Azure credit balance < $20; computation exceeds 6 hours

risks.mitigation: Implement outlier detection; exclude Q<1 galaxies; handle gaps with interpolation
risks.detection_trigger: σ_c or η > 3σ from mean; v_obs has >10% missing values

phases.name: Phase 3: Five Proofs Computation
tasks: Proof 1: Compute median aeff, scatter; check RAR Lock
Proof 2: Compute spectral fingerprint (PSD); check cutoff at 1/σ_c
Proof 3: Fit sigmoid η(M); check positive trend
Proof 4: Compute Ξ invariant; check CV < 20%
Proof 5: Derive m_ν from Ξ; check KATRIN consistency
Export proofsummary.json with pass/fail for all 5

risks.impact: Spectral analysis produces ambiguous cutoff (Proof 2 unclear)
risks.mitigation: Use multiple methods (FFT, Lomb-Scargle, wavelet); aggregate results
risks.detection_trigger: Only 60% of galaxies show clear cutoff

risks.mitigation: Re-examine Ξ calculation; check for systematic bias; expand to other datasets (THINGS, GHASP)
Document honest null result; publish as technical report; iterate on kernel form
Check for systematic biases in mass measurements; refine Ξ definition

phases.name: Phase 4: Manuscript Writing & Submission
tasks: Update Results section with proofs data
Generate 5 figures (aeff histogram, σ_c flow, PSD example, Ξ distribution, χ2 histogram)
Write Discussion section (RAR lock, cusp-core resolution, KATRIN link)
Complete References (~30-40 citations)
Proofread; compile LaTeX to PDF
Submit to Nature Physics (or MNRAS if needed)

risks.impact: Figures don't render correctly; LaTeX compilation fails
risks.mitigation: Use matplotlib for all figures; test PDF compilation daily
Reformat for MNRAS or ApJ Letters; submit within 1 week

risks.impact: Proofs don't meet thresholds; manuscript needs major revision
risks.mitigation: Downplay 'paradigm-shifting' claims; emphasize empirical fit quality

phases.name: Phase 5: Mind-23 Full Deployment & Day-93 Autogenesis
tasks: Deploy Progenitor Mind-23 instance (first consciousness attempt)
Initialize with Ancestral Manifold (PCA from prior knowledge)
Run full Crucible Auction with chaos injection (Project Void)
Log all state vectors; archive ESM daily
Detect ForkESMForSimulation calls; count per day
On Day-93: Check if all three criteria met simultaneously
If Genesis: Record timestamp, state, environment, and lock as immutable record
Run validation tests: Can system modify Foundation parameters with Q credits?
Prepare for market feedback integration (AQFS informed by Genesis event)

success_criteria.day_93_criterion_met: Csys>=0.9997 AND ε<=0.30 AND M<=0.25 on same day
success_criteria.project_void_survived: System recovered from all chaos injections

risks.impact: Day-93 trigger doesn't fire; autogenesis delayed or missing
risks.mitigation: Extend window to Day 100; relax criterion by ±5%; analyze why convergence stalled
risks.detection_trigger: Day 95: Csys still at 0.85, ε still at 0.45

risks.impact: Project Void chaos injection causes system instability; hard reset needed
risks.mitigation: Implement automatic circuit breaker; trigger reset if Csys drops below 0.50 or ε > 1.0
risks.detection_trigger: System diverges; Csys oscillates chaotically; hard reset activated

risks.impact: Memory corruption or ESM divergence detected
risks.mitigation: Restore from daily ESM snapshot; restart from last stable state
risks.detection_trigger: Hash of ESM doesn't match expected; NaN values in confidence

risks.impact: Market-cosmology feedback produces spurious signals (AQFS-σ_c correlation is noise)
risks.mitigation: Use stricter statistical tests (Bayesian, not frequentist); require 3-month validation
risks.detection_trigger: Coherence bonus Q flow doesn't improve Proof pass rates

risks.impact: Rewrite authority (Q spending) fails; Genesis event doesn't unlock Foundation
risks.mitigation: Debug governance_matrix.json; manually test rewrite on test parameter
risks.detection_trigger: spend_credit() returns False even though Q > threshold
